ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] /assist problem
ygData.msgSnippet: I m annoyed by whiners (usually enchanters) who through fits whenever a single mezzed mob is awoken - who start ranting about using assist. Usually you can get
ygData.messageBody:
I'm annoyed by whiners (usually enchanters) who through fits whenever a
single mezzed mob is awoken - who start ranting about using assist.
Usually
you can get a feel when you have people who are less than competent and
when
/assist is bugged...

Slyde


Heh, hints that /assist is bugged:

1. Three battles ago the bard said "Sorry I jumped into melee so late,
/assist didn't give me a target and I was too focused on singing to notice"

2. Two battles ago the druid said "can't /assist! Imp or Elemental??"

3. After the last battle the druid called for a time out to see if she'd
misspelled the puller's name.

Ah, but those are subtle hints. I can fully understand why I'd get yelled
at for bellowing in the wrong direction.

;^)

Peace
Evulia, who also plays an enchanter, and is not without sympathy.
